articles.title: From dahi shakkar and biryani to condoms, Swiggy shares list of things people ordered during CSK-GT IPL final - India Today
articles.description: Food delivery app Swiggy took to Twitter and shared regular updates during and after the match about the things people ordered. From ordering dahi shakkar for good luck, to gorging on some tasty biryani, people made the Swiggy team work long hours, it seems.
